snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 550: Sonic Mega Drive aka Sonic Neo Genesis (SAGE2014 Act 2 & SAGE2016)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic Mega Drive (Sonic Neo Genesis) - SAGE2014-2016
Credit: Felik (Team Emerald)
Release Date: August 3rd, 2014 & October 15th, 2016

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

(SAGE2014 Act 2)
00:00 - Title
00:22 - Tropical Madness Zone Act 1
08:08 - Tropical Madness Zone Act 2
13:41 - Credits

(SAGE2016)
14:48 - Boos&Stuff
15:18 - Tropical Madness Zone Act 1
22:42 - Tropical Madness Zone Act 2
30:10 - City Lights Zone Act 1
42:20 - City Lights Zone Act 2
50:36 - Credits

NOTES: Welcome to the mysterious place known as the Mythical Miracle Island.
Eggman has managed to escape with the Emeralds to this place only to lose em.
Parking his large Flagship airship near the Island as he goes off in attempts to access a Special Zone...
Among other mysteries that have been buried within its past.
The Myths behind Miracle Island say that only the elites of an ancient civilization were allowed to set foot on this place but not leave.
It is also rumored that a Infinite Plane exists somewhere on this Island where the Master of Chaos Emeralds were made.
This Civilization was however wiped out of existence in such a severe manner that we don't know if they even existed.
This naturally peaks the interest of Knuckles who sets out on his own adventure instead of tagging along with Sonic & Tails.
Meanwhile Sonic & Tails make it to the Island in pursuit of Eggman and attempt to get back the Emeralds.
Overall with all of that said and done this game sounds and plays pretty nicely.
Extra collectibles can unlock new moves among other.
Sonic however is the only playable character here as Tails & Knuckles don't exist.
If there is any downsides I would say 2016 not having the more unique 2014 Title Screen art is a downgrade for me.
As 2016 looks more generic but otherwise 2016 has a huge graphical overhaul.
City Lights makes me question is this civilization actually gone or not though...

(ISSUES)

1. Can softlock with the first boss.
